title: Foes of Mordor (1U105)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Exert a [Gondor] character to wound a [Sauron] minion.
Lore:	Through the long years, the Men of the Tower of Guard have shielded the West from the minions of the Eye.
Rarity:	U
